DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility , tolerability , safety , image quality low-radiation , dynamic perfusion CT heart patient suspect ischemic chest pain moderate severe stenosis see coronary CTA . Secondary aim include assessment diagnostic accuracy CT perfusion imaging compare either SPECT invasive angiography .
DOC.brief_title: Use Lexiscan Myocardial Stress Perfusion Computed Tomography With 3rd Generation Dual Source CT System
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject must present symptom ( e.g . chest pain ) suspicious cardiac ischemia determine treat physician . 2 . Subject must refer cardiac CT angiography OR subject must undergo clinically indicated SPECT positive equivocal finding OR subject must undergo clinically indicated SPECT prior cardiac CT angiography show moderate severe stenosis . 3 . Subject must 18 85 year age . 4 . Subject must provide write informed consent prior studyrelated procedure perform . 5 . Subject must willing comply clinical study procedure . 1 . Subject pregnant nursing female . Exclude possibility pregnancy : By test ( serum urine beta HCG ) within 24 hour study agent administration , By surgical sterilization , Post menopausal , minimum one ( 1 ) year history without menses . 2 . Subject severe asthma COPD require frequent inhaler use . 3 . Subject prior diagnosis obstructive CAD revascularized . 4 . Subject implanted rhythm device ( pacemaker , defibrillator ) . 5 . Subject significant arrhythmia . 6 . Subject high grade heart block . 7 . Subject rest heart rate < 45 bpm , systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg , consume caffeine within last 12 hour . 8 . Subject acute psychiatric disorder . 9 . Subject unwilling comply requirement protocol . 10 . Subject previously enter study . 11 . Subject allergy iodinate contrast agent pharmaceutical stressor use study . 12 . Subject suffers claustrophobia . 13 . Subject impaired renal function ( creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl ) . 14 . Subject unstable condition . 15 . STelevations , new transient ST change great 0.05mV T wave inversion symptom 16 . Subject safely administer Lexiscanâ„¢ per prescribe information determine investigator 17 . Subject receive interventional ( PCI , stenting ) surgical ( CABG ) treatment may alter cardiac condition regard myocardial perfusion status and/or stenosis degree cardiac CTA , SPECT , and/or CT stress perfusion study .
